page.title: 13PRIVATE EDUCATION IN HARROW
page.content: MOST SCHOOLS IN THIS AREA WEAR SCHOOL UNIFORM, PRIVATE SCHOOLS ARE PARTICULARLY STRICT ABOUT THIS. PRIVATE OR FEE PAYING SCHOOLS ARE ACTUALLY REFERRED TO AS PUBLIC SCHOOLS! THE MOST FAMOUS ONE OF THESE IS HARROW SCHOOL WHICH DOMINATES HARROW HILL. IT WAS FOUNDED IN 1572 BY JOHN LYON AND WAS GRANTED A ROYAL CHARTER BY ELIZABETH THE FIRST. THE SCHOOL AND ITS GROUNDS COVER OVER 300 ACRES WITH CRICKET PITCHES ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE HILL AND A SPORTS CENTRE AND SCHOOL FARM ON THE EAST. THE SCHOOL IS COMPRISED OF ELEVEN BOARDING HOUSES AND THERE ARE 77 ACADEMIC STAFF AND 754 BOYS. THE FEES ARE AMONG THE MOST EXPENSIVE IN THE COUNTRY- CURRENTLY OVER Â£5850 PER YEAR. ONE OF THE SCHOOL'S FAMOUS OLD BOYS IS SIR WINSTON CHURCHILL AFTER WHOM ONE OF THE HALLS IS NAMED.
